The entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" are:

* "Curr Wk" (which refers to the current week)
* "Yr Ago" (which refers to a year ago)

The valid entities that clearly refer to "Organization" are:

* "Yr Ago" (which refers to a year ago)
* "Curr Wk Yr to Date" (which refers to the current week's year-to-date)
